issues.message: 'int' should not be explicitly used as the underlying type.
'int' should not be explicitly used as the underlying type.
'IEnumerable<StringKeyValuePair>' implements 'IEnumerable' so 'IEnumerable' can be removed from the inheritance list.
'Dictionary<string, string>' implements 'IEnumerable<StringKeyValuePair>' so 'IEnumerable<StringKeyValuePair>' can be removed from the inheritance list.
'int' should not be explicitly used as the underlying type.
